entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
